summary: Onion Jack has bought a piece of land on which to settle, but the property is still in possession of the orphans of the original owner and is coveted by the local oil baron.
cast: Franco Nero|Sterling Hayden|Martin Balsam|Emma Cohen|Leo Anchóriz|Romano Puppo|Nazzareno Zamperla|Massimo Vanni|Helmut Brasch|Duilio Cruciani|Fernando Castro|Wal Davis|Dan van Husen|Dick Butkus|Agustín Bescos|Xan das Bolas|Charly Bravo|Enzo G. Castellari|Alejandro de Enciso|Leopold Francis|Daniel Martín|Antonio Pica|George Rigaud|Lucy Tiller|Mariano Vidal Molina|David Warbeck|Manuel Zarzo
director: Director: Enzo G. Castellari (as Enzo Girolami)
title: Los locos del oro negro
